DOC.brief_title: Tamoxifen Reduce Unscheduled Bleeding New Users Levonorgestrel-releasing Intrauterine System ( LNG-IUS )
DOC.detailed_description: New user LNG IUS eligible . Subjects randomize receive tamoxifen 10 mg BID 7 day placebo . Study drug start 3 week placement IUS . Subjects maintain record daily bleed spot use electronic text message diary .
